data.lyric:
[ti:i'm so tired…]
[ar:Lauv/Troye Sivan]
[al:i'm so tired… (feat. Troye Sivan)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]i'm so tired... - Lauv/Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)
[00:00.86]Lyrics by：Ari Leff/Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Michael Pollack/Oscar Görres
[00:01.72]Composed by：Ari Leff/Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Michael Pollack/Oscar Görres
[00:02.59]Lauv：
[00:07.87]I'm so tired of love songs tired of love songs
[00:10.78]Tired of love songs tired of love
[00:12.94]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[00:15.42]Wanna go home woah
[00:17.61]So tired of love songs tired of love songs
[00:20.10]Tired of love songs tired of love
[00:22.26]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[00:24.85]Wanna go home woah
[00:27.06]Party trying my best to meet somebody
[00:33.82]But everybody around me is falling in love to our song
[00:39.92]I I oh I I yeah
[00:45.91]Hate it taking a shot 'cause I can't take it
[00:52.47]But I don't think that they make anything that strong so I hold on
[00:58.59]I I oh I I yeah
[01:03.91]I'm so tired of love songs tired of love songs
[01:06.72]Tired of love songs tired of love
[01:08.88]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[01:11.38]Wanna go home woah
[01:13.51]So tired of love songs tired of love songs
[01:16.04]Tired of love songs tired of love
[01:18.22]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[01:20.69]Wanna go home woah
[01:22.79]Troye Sivan：
[01:23.05]Strangers killing my lonely nights with strangers
[01:30.13]And when they leave I go back to our song I hold on
[01:36.01]I I oh I I
[01:39.99]Hurts like heaven lost in the sound
[01:44.55]Buzzcut season like you're still around
[01:49.24]Can't unmiss you and I need you now
[01:54.38]Yeah I I oh I I yeah
[01:59.54]Lauv/Troye Sivan：
[02:00.04]I'm so tired of love songs tired of love songs
[02:02.66]Tired of love songs tired of love
[02:04.79]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[02:07.27]Wanna go home woah
[02:09.40]So tired of love songs tired of love songs
[02:11.96]Tired of love songs tired of love
[02:14.13]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[02:16.56]Wanna go home woah
[02:18.51]I'm so tired of love songs
[02:20.10]Tired of love songs tired of love songs
[02:22.18]Someone take me home
[02:22.86]Tired of love
[02:23.44]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[02:25.92]'Cause I can't be alone
[02:26.90]Wanna go home woah
[02:28.23]So tired of love songs tired of love songs
[02:30.14]I'm so tired
[02:30.72]Tired of love songs tired of love
[02:32.77]Just wanna go home wanna go home
[02:35.26]Wanna go home woah
data.trans:
[ti:i'm so tired…]
[ar:Lauv/Troye Sivan]
[al:i'm so tired… (feat. Troye Sivan)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.86]//
[00:01.72]//
[00:02.59]//
[00:07.87]我厌倦了情歌 厌倦陈词滥调
[00:10.78]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[00:12.94]倦鸟只想归巢 只想归巢
[00:15.42]人倦只想归家
[00:17.61]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[00:20.10]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[00:22.26]倦鸟只想归巢 只想归巢
[00:24.85]人倦只想归家
[00:27.06]热闹派对 我竭尽全力寻找对的人
[00:33.82]身边的人 却都沉沦在我们的歌中
[00:39.92]我啊我
[00:45.91]痛恨这种感受 杯中酒一饮而尽 因为我无法再待
[00:52.47]众生糊涂迷惘 所以我自持冷静
[00:58.59]我啊我
[01:03.91]我厌倦了情歌 厌倦陈词滥调
[01:06.72]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[01:08.88]倦鸟只想归巢 只想归巢
[01:11.38]人倦只想归家
[01:13.51]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[01:16.04]厌倦情情爱爱 厌倦陈词滥调
[01:18.22]倦鸟只想归巢 只想归巢
[01:20.69]人倦只想归家
[01:22.79]//
[01:23.05]和陌生人 消磨这孤寂夜晚
[01:30.13]曲终人散 而我回归这乐曲
[01:36.01]我啊我
[01:39.99]Hurts like heaven响起 沉醉在旋律中
[01:44.55]短发的季节来临 恍若你还在身边
[01:49.24]不能错失你 我此刻需要你
[01:54.38]我啊我
[01:59.54]//

[02:07.27]人倦只想归家

[02:22.86]厌倦情情爱爱

[02:26.90]人倦只想归家
